sub_title: Professor of Computer Science & Executive Director
summary:
INSTITUTE DIRECTOR/RESEARCH DIRECTOR/EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR

Highly acclaimed senior management professional with noteworthy experience in areas of education, research and leadership pertaining to computer science, information systems and digital manufacturing. Noted as one of the original promulgators of ‘service-oriented computing’. Renowned for establishing local ‘pockets of research excellence’ in service science and engineering in several European countries, China, Australia  and the UAE. World-class contributor of pioneering innovations and first-rate science for resolving key scientific problems pertaining to software development, distributed and cloud computing, and web services research. Out-of-the-box thinker seeking global ventures and promising opportunities for translating compelling ideas into oral and written research proposals and deliverables for demanding C-level audience. Committed towards contributing to the world of science for providing a better future to forthcoming generations.

CORE COMPETENCIES

▪ Research Leadership ▪ Internationalization Programmes ▪ Project and Program Management ▪ Content Development and Management ▪ Quality Learning Experience ▪ Industry Engagement ▪ People Management and Coaching ▪ Departmental Operations ▪ Company Policies and Regulatory Compliance ▪ Business Development and Analytical Skills ▪ Performance Standards Development ▪ Process Improvement ▪ Internal and External Relationships ▪

TECHNICAL COMPETENCIES

▪ Service Oriented Computing ▪ Software and Service Engineering ▪ Cloud Computing ▪ Distributed Computing ▪ Enterprise Computing and Enterprise Applications ▪ Systems Analysis and Design ▪ Database and Information Systems ▪ Intelligent Systems ▪ Business Process Management ▪ Digital Factories ▪ Digital Manufacturing ▪ Digital Product Development ▪ Product Engineering ▪ Product Lifecycle Management ▪ Global Business Solutions ▪ e-Business, e-Commerce and e-Health ▪ Smart Technology Solutions ▪

treasury_media.title: Blueprinting solutions for cloud computing
treasury_media.description:
Cloud blueprinting is a novel approach that
lets developers easily syndicate, configure, and deploy virtual service-based
application payloads on virtual machine and resource pools in the cloud.

treasury_media.title: SOA Application Development
treasury_media.description:
This presentation provides an overview of the methods and techniques that can be used in SOA-based application development.  You will gain an in-depth understanding of the following key SOA design and development concepts:

â¢ The nature of software development methodologies.

â¢ Best practices for developing SOA-based applications.
â¢ Reference models for SOA development.
â¢ Guiding principles of service-oriented design and development.
â¢ Phases in the SOA development lifecycle.
â¢ SOA analysis and design techniques.
â¢ SOA implementation techniques.

awards.title: Albert Nelson Marquis Lifetime Achievement Award by Marquis Who’s Who
awards.description:
Marquis Who’s Who, the world’s premier publisher of biographical profiles, is proud to present Michael Papazoglou with the Albert Nelson Marquis Lifetime Achievement Award. An accomplished listee, Dr. Papazoglou celebrates many years’ experience in his professional network, and has been noted for achievements, leadership qualities, and the credentials and successes he has accrued in his field. As in all Marquis Who’s Who biographical volumes, individuals profiled are selected on the basis of current reference value. Factors such as position, noteworthy accomplishments, visibility, and prominence in a field are all taken into account during the selection process.
http://www.michaelppapazoglou.com/

projects.title: CitySDK: Smart City Service Development Kit & its application pilots
projects.description: CitySDK is creating a toolkit for the development of digital services within cities. The toolkit comprises of open and interoperable digital service interfaces as well as processes, guidelines and usability standards. CitySDK enables a more efficient utilisation of the expertise and know-how of developer communities to be applied in city service development.

projects.title: Business Process Compliance Management (BPCM) Tool Suite
projects.description: In today's business environment, organizations are required to cope with increasing number of compliance laws and regulations, such as Sarbanes-Oxley, Basel I-III, IFRS, HIPAA, etc. These directives oblige organizations to review their business processes and ensure that these processes are compliant to the requirements set forth. Business Process Compliance Management (BPCM) Framework helps organizations to manage compliance along the Business Process Lifecycle pursuing a preventive approach.
